snippet: The packaging of Kim Jong-un as the embodiment of the North’s still widely revered founding president suggests a well-oiled machine is at work to create a new leader.
abstract: Memo from South Korea; packaging of North Korean leader Kim Jong-un as the embodiment of Kim Il-sung, country's beloved founding president and Kim's grandfather, suggests a well-oiled machine is at work to create a new leader; strategy of having Kim assume his grandfather's persona, from his sideburns to the way he clapped his hands, reflects the slightness of the younger man's resume.
lead_paragraph: The packaging of Kim Jong-un as the embodiment of the North’s still widely revered founding president suggests a well-oiled machine is at work to create a new leader.

headline.seo: Behind New North Korean Leader, a Well-Oiled Machine
headline.main: To Sell a New Leader, North Korea Finds a Mirror Is Handy
